Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package moby-compose for versions less than 2.17.2-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package moby-compose for versions less than 2.17.2-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-compose is earlier than 2.17.2-5, affected by CVE-2023-44487
